title: What is the way for IT infrastructure? Will it head towards cloud or open source? What are the reasons impacting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Over time, (say) 10+ or 20+ years (or even further) out, it is increasingly safer to bet on workloads transitioning to public cloud. Open source has, is and will continue to play a crucial role in this transition. It is NOT an “either or” situation. It is also safer to bet on private cloud workloads will get increasingly specialized to drive up efficiencies at lower cost at scale, or for beginner workloads that are simply cheaper to try locally without incurring public cloud costs.
